info.name: Tella WA
info.description:
#### Whatsapp backend   
   
### Schedullers:

- 1/day
  - Checks if promocode is expired or not
  - Checks if subscribers subscription expires whithin n-days (configured by admin)   
- Last day of month
  - Unlockes phone change   
- 1/min
  - Message sender   

### PayBox Payment system is used

request.description:
### First step to change subscriber password

{{API_URL}}/subscriber/forgot   
perm:
- Any: any   
Code expires in 10 minutes

### Second step to change subscriber password

{{API_URL}}/subscriber/restore   
perm:
- Any: any   
Code expires in 10 minutes

### Therd step to change subscriber password

{{API_URL}}/subscriber/reset   
perm:
- Any: any   
Code expires in 10 minutes

### Signup subscriber   

{{API_URL}}/subscriber/signup   
perm:
- Subscriber: creates subscriber    

Request exapmle:
```
{
    "first_name": "Andres",
    "last_name": "Muller F9R5SFtYYfeXrwU2jN",
    "email": "andres.muller44@ethereal.email",
    "phone": "+7755505497",
    "password": "1234"
}

{
    "first_name": "Eric",
    "last_name": "Moen jgkTzeCmq7qPTwvRz6",
    "email": "erich.moen@ethereal.email",
    "phone": "+77755505497",
    "password": "1234"
}
```   

Creates this model in MONGO  
```
{   
"_id":"5d9dda57d8a3bb32b04f6518",   
"__v":0,   
"createdAt":"2019-10-09T13:02:15.029Z",   
"email":"andres.muller44@ethereal.email",   
"first_name":"Andres",   
"last_name":"Muller F9R5SFtYYfeXrwU2jN",   
"password":"7f81ad6f2fb0074ca42a14364c652b104f27f69814408556c4ec4fcd9e1af1d9",   
"phone":"+7755505497",   
"salt":"c650f3ac959708d0750f53546b969193",   
"subscriber":false,   
"updatedAt":"2019-10-09T13:02:15.029Z"}   
```

response.name: Sign up(Create Subscriber)/ User with this PHONE already exists
Sign up(Create Subscriber)/User with this EMAIL already exists
Sign up(Create Subscriber)/User password not provided

request.description:
### Signin subscriber/admin

{{API_URL}}/subscriber/signin   
perm:
- Admin: enters wp system
- Subscriber: enters wp system 

Request exapmle:
```
{
    "email": "andres.muller44@ethereal.email",
    "password": "12345"
}
{
	"email": "erich.moen@ethereal.email",
    "password": "12345"
}

```   

Returns jwt token

response.name: Sign in(Enter to the System)/ Invalid password

request.description:
### Change subscriber/admin password

{{API_URL}}/subscriber/change   
perm:
- Admin: self 
- Subscriber: self

### Delete subscriber

{{API_URL}}/subscriber/--id--   
perm:
- Admin: anyone 
- Subscriber: not_permoted

### Get all subscriber/admin

{{API_URL}}/subscriber
perm:
- Admin: all 
- Subscriber: not_permited

{{API_URL}}/subscriber/--subscriberid--   
perm:
- Admin: gets anyone
- Subscriber: returns himself even --subscriberid-- provided

### Update subscriber   


{{API_URL}}/subscriber
perm:
- Admin: anyone 
- Subscriber: self

Request exapmle:
```
{
    "first_name": "Andres",
    "last_name": "Muller F9R5SFtYYfeXrwU2jN",
    "email": "andres.muller44@ethereal.email",
    "phone": "+7755505497",
    "password": "1234"
}

{
    "first_name": "Eric",
    "last_name": "Moen jgkTzeCmq7qPTwvRz6",
    "email": "erich.moen@ethereal.email",
    "phone": "+77755505497",
    "password": "1234"
}
```   

Creates this model in MONGO  
```
{   
"_id":"5d9dda57d8a3bb32b04f6518",   
"__v":0,   
"createdAt":"2019-10-09T13:02:15.029Z",   
"email":"andres.muller44@ethereal.email",   
"first_name":"Andres",   
"last_name":"Muller F9R5SFtYYfeXrwU2jN",   
"password":"7f81ad6f2fb0074ca42a14364c652b104f27f69814408556c4ec4fcd9e1af1d9",   
"phone":"+7755505497",   
"salt":"c650f3ac959708d0750f53546b969193",

```

item.name: Call back for PAYBOX Extend Subscriber Subscription  by Subscriber ID

request.description:
### Extends   

{{API_URL}}/subscriber/subscription/--id--
perm:
- Admin: Admin extends from another url 
- Subscriber: self

Request exapmle:
```
{
    "first_name": "Andres",
    "last_name": "Muller F9R5SFtYYfeXrwU2jN",
    "email": "andres.muller44@ethereal.email",
    "phone": "+7755505497",
    "password": "1234"
}

{
    "first_name": "Eric",
    "last_name": "Moen jgkTzeCmq7qPTwvRz6",
    "email": "erich.moen@ethereal.email",
    "phone": "+77755505497",
    "password": "1234"
}
```   

Creates this model in MONGO  
```
{   
"_id":"5d9dda57d8a3bb32b04f6518",   
"__v":0,   
"createdAt":"2019-10-09T13:02:15.029Z",   
"email":"andres.muller44@ethereal.email",   
"first_name":"Andres",   
"last_name":"Muller F9R5SFtYYfeXrwU2jN",   
"password":"7f81ad6f2fb0074ca42a14364c652b104f27f69814408556c4ec4fcd9e1af1d9",   
"phone":"+7755505497",   
"salt":"c650f3ac959708d0750f53546b969193",   
"subscriber":false,   
"updatedAt":"2019-10-09T13:02:15.029Z"}   
```

### Extends   

{{API_URL}}/subscriber/payment
perm:
- Admin: useles 
- Subscriber: self

Request exapmle:
```
{
    "promocode": "1234"
}

### Create promocode   


{{API_URL}}/promocode   
perm:
- Admin: any 
- Subscriber: not_permited

### Delete promocode   


{{API_URL}}/promocode/--id--   
perm:
- Admin: any 
- Subscriber: not_permited

### Get promocode   


{{API_URL}}/promocode   
perm:
- Admin: any 
- Subscriber: any

### Update promocode   


{{API_URL}}/promocode/--id--   
perm:
- Admin: any 
- Subscriber: not_permited

### Get all promocodes   


{{API_URL}}/promocode/--id--   
perm:
- Admin: any 
- Subscriber: any

### Get settings   

{{API_URL}}/settings
perm:
- Admin: any 
- Subscriber: not_permited

### Create/Update subscription   

{{API_URL}}/subscription
perm:
- Admin: any 
- Subscriber: not_permited    

Request exapmle:
```
 {
   "is_active": true,
    "title": "Moon",
   "prices": {
   	"amount": "100",
   	"currency":"KZT"
   }
  }
```

### Get subscription   

{{API_URL}}/subscription
perm:
- Any: any

### Create message   

{{API_URL}}/msg
perm:
- Admin: any 
- Subscriber: not_permited

### Delete message   

{{API_URL}}/msg/--id--
perm:
- Admin: any 
- Subscriber: not_permited

### Get messages   

{{API_URL}}/msg
perm:
- Admin: any 
- Subscriber: not_permited
